verses.name: Acts 16:30
verses.text: And brought them out, and said, Sirs, what must I do to be saved?

verses.name: Acts 16:31
verses.text: And they said, Believe on the Lord Jesus Christ, and thou shalt be saved, and thy house.

verses.name: Acts 16:32
verses.text: And they spake unto him the word of the Lord, and to all that were in his house.

verses.name: Acts 16:33
verses.text: And he took them the same hour of the night, and washed their stripes; and was baptized, he and all his, straightway.

verses.name: Acts 16:34
verses.text: And when he had brought them into his house, he set meat before them, and rejoiced, believing in God with all his house.
